view.beerapp.repository

Class FirebaseLocationRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.beerapp.repository.FirebaseLocationRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseData, ILocationRepository

    public class FirebaseLocationRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILocationRepository, IDatabaseData
    Use to do CRUD operation on the location node in Firebase. Singleton Pattern
